scriptmanager.scripts.Coordinate_Manipulation.BED_Manipulation

Class ExpandBED

  • java.lang.Object
    • scriptmanager.scripts.Coordinate_Manipulation.BED_Manipulation.ExpandBED

  • public class ExpandBED
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that contains method for expanding (BED) coordinate intervals from the center/border by a user-defined direction and distance.
    Author:
    William KM Lai
    See Also:
    ExpandBEDCLI, ExpandBEDWindow

    • Method Detail

      • expandBEDBorders

        public static void expandBEDBorders(java.io.File out_filepath,
                                    java.io.File input,
                                    int SIZE,
                                    boolean ExCenter,
                                    boolean gzOutput)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Self-contained method for expanding the BED-formatted intervals in a BED file by user-specified distance and strategy. This method accounts for even-sized BED interval expansion in midpoint calculations by using the strand-aware downstream nucleotide between the two center nucleotides.
        Parameters:
        out_filepath - Filepath to save expanded BED-formatted files. If null, outputs to STDOUT.
        input - Filepath to starting BED-formatted coordinates we want to shift. Supports automatic detection and handling of GZipped BED-formatted files. Must have at least 3 tab-delimited columns per BED specifications.
        SIZE - Integer value indicating number of nucleotides to expand by (must be a positive integer).
        ExCenter - Specifies expansion strategy: if true, size expansion will be performed from the midpoint of each BED interval, if false, size expansion will be performed from the border/edges of the BED intervals (default=true).
        gzOutput - If this is true, the output file will be gzipped.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
